dmca.title: Notice of copyright infringement and request for take-down concerning www.ps3cheats.c
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Briant, Jared [mailto:JBriant@faegre.com] 
Sent: Thursday, February 08, 2007 4:34 PM
To: Legal Response
Subject: Notice of copyright infringement and request for take-down
concerning www.ps3cheats.com

 

Dear Ms. Almeida - 

 

Please see the attached letter of today's date.  A hard copy of this
letter is being sent via overnight delivery as well.  

 

Please do not hesitate to contact me with any questions.

 

LAWYER BIOGRAPHIES <http://www.faegre.com/firm_lawyers.aspx>  | PRACTICE
EXPERIENCE <http://www.faegre.com/firm_practice.aspx>  | CONTACT US
<http://www.faegre.com/contact_info.aspx> 

  <http://www.faegre.com/> 

Jared B. Briant

Associate

1900 Fifteenth Street
